import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import logo from "../images/logo.svg"; import hamburgerIcon from "../images/icons/hamburger.svg"; function Nav({ mobileSm, mobileLg, tabletSm, tabletLg, desktopSm, desktopLg }) { const [showMenu, setShowMenu] = useState(false); const toggleMenu = () => { showMenu ? setShowMenu(false) : setShowMenu(true); } return ( <>

}
